summary: A Full stack developer with a passion and focus on front end development. Always looking for better ways to build modern web applications using reliable design patterns, best practices, and the latest tools. A collaborator who enjoys investing in others and is always eager to learn. Driven to create intuitive web applications that yield excellent user experiences. With more than 3 years of experience, currently a senior software engineer at Virtusa (Pvt) Ltd.
summary1: I am Angela Amarapala, a Graduate Software Engineer with over 3 years of coding experience.
summary2: Focused on creating modern, responsive, highly interactive web applications. Passionate about learning new technologies.
summary3: I also manage to make some time for painting, traveling, baking cakes and reading some nice books.
